about_the_game:
Hey!

I hope that S.M.A.C.K. has brought you a little bit of joy/nostalgia/inspiration, and if it has, purchasing this expansion pack is a way of saying "Hey thanks, here's some coffee" to the people involved with the development of the game.

In this pack you will recieve a growing list of cosmetic items for the game to trick out your R.I.G. including a special crown for your character to prove to your friends how deep your pockets can go.

Thanks a million,

-KK
detailed_description:
Hey!

I hope that S.M.A.C.K. has brought you a little bit of joy/nostalgia/inspiration, and if it has, purchasing this expansion pack is a way of saying "Hey thanks, here's some coffee" to the people involved with the development of the game.

In this pack you will recieve a growing list of cosmetic items for the game to trick out your R.I.G. including a special crown for your character to prove to your friends how deep your pockets can go.

name: S.M.A.C.K. - Expansion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7, AMD Ryzen 7 or above
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 2070 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: With the S.M.A.C.K. Expansion Pack you will recieve a growing list of cosmetic items for the game to trick out your R.I.G. Including a special crown for your character to prove to your friends how deep your pockets can go.
